appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

app_descript:
Gospel Living

Brief: Gospel Living is an engaging mobile application tailored for members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. With an emphasis on personal spiritual growth, it serves as a digital companion providing a myriad of resources to foster faith, track personal progress, and connect with the community. Whether you're looking to enrich your daily study or organize your church-related goals and activities, Gospel Living offers a convenient way to stay inspired and integrated with your faith.

Core Features:

  • üìö Discover Feed: Regularly updated with articles, videos, and images to support your gospel study, including links to the "Come, Follow Me" lessons. üìÖ
  • üéØ Today View: Manage daily tasks with reminders and track your progression on goals and planned activities. ‚úÖ
  • üìù New Entry: A personal journal to record your thoughts, save photos, and set reminders to help achieve your goals. üñãÔ∏è
  • üå± My Life Dashboard: Consolidates all your content, including thoughts, photos, and goals, in a single organizing screen. üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è
  • üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Circles: Connects you with your church circles such as family, classes, and quorum members, allowing for sharing and discussion of spiritual content. üîó

Pros:

  • üëº Inspirational Content: Continuously provides uplifting material that aligns with church teachings and values. üåü

Price:

(As the Gospel Living app is not a game app, the community section is not included in its description.)
